QuestParts.Response2: Stay here at the staging area, protect these people.
QuestParts.Response1: Good, I need help clearing out the farm.
QuestParts.Response3: And what took you so long?
QuestParts.GiverText: Sorry we're late, the Chief sent us to help.

QuestParts.Response2: Roger that. I'm headed out now!
QuestParts.GiverText: We’re with you all the way! Also, the Chief told us that we should investigate a Church south of the village.

QuestParts.Response1: Alright, thanks for letting me know, I'll do just that.
QuestParts.Response3: Hmm, I may need backup in that case, come with me.
QuestParts.GiverText: Roger, roger: before you go, the Chief told us that we should investigate a Church south of the village, and to clear the farm of to the west.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Investigate the Church to the south across the River and clear the Farm to the West of Demons.

QuestParts.Response2: You sure you didn't take a pit stop at Danny's Donuts first?
QuestParts.Response1: God do I hate that town, those people are ruining the Bay.
QuestParts.Response3: There's no excuse for this behavior, lives are at stake. I'll be informing the Chief about this.
QuestParts.GiverText: We got stuck in Traffic at TechTopia. I told Larry we should take 280 but he never listens!

QuestParts.Response3: Actually, I don't want you to follow me.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Go to investigate the Mysterious Happenings at the Church South of the Village across the River.

QuestParts.Response2: Noted, but I still think we should clear the farm of Demons first. I will do that now.
QuestParts.Response1: If we can find the source of the Demons, maybe we can stop them from coming in. I'll investigate it now. Peace.
QuestParts.GiverText: Apparently that’s where the first Demon was spotted.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Go Investigate the Church to the South across the River.

QuestParts.Response2: Your incompetence is costing the lives of innocent people! What is your badge ID? I will be informing the  chief of this.
QuestParts.Response1: Good, I need help clearing the farm.
QuestParts.Response3: I don't need your help. Stay out of my way.
QuestParts.GiverText: If only the Demons would start attacking those pretentious jackholes. Anyways, we’re here to help now.

QuestParts.Response2: That's understandable, did you save any for me?
QuestParts.Response1: There is a Demon invasion happening right now and you stopped off for Donuts?
QuestParts.Response3: Are you crazy? People could have died! I'll be informing the Chief of this.
QuestParts.GiverText: *sighs* You got us, they had a 20% off discount sale. They were selling Baker's Dozens half off! We couldn't miss it.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Berate or converse with the Officers.

QuestParts.Response2: There's dead bodies all around us. I don't think anyone would care if I added two more to the pile. Time to die!
QuestParts.Response1: I-I-I- screw off, protect these people, you're dead to me Jenkins.

QuestParts.Response2: What's your name? Jenkins? I'm telling the whole Precinct about this,
QuestParts.Response1: What? What is yesh? What does that mean?
QuestParts.Response3: Well, I guess we all have our vices. Now tell me, what is the word from the Chief?

QuestParts.Response2: It sounds bad, protect these people at the staging area until I get back. I wont forget this.
QuestParts.Response1: Honestly I don't even care right now, we have bigger problems on our hands. Now help me clear the farm of demons.
QuestParts.Response3: This is an unforgiveable offense. I will be reporting you for this.
QuestParts.GiverText: Sorry, I know how this must sound.

QuestParts.Response2: I hate you. Just tell me why you are here.
QuestParts.Response1: Are you serious? You're over an hour late because you stopped for donuts and you didn't even save me one?
QuestParts.Response3: That's a reportable offense in my opinion. In fact, I think I will do that now.
QuestParts.GiverText: Uh, we just finished the last one in the squad car.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Berate the Officers for not saving you a Donut.

QuestParts.Response2: Let me stop you there. What is it you came here to tell me?
Are you trying to shirk your civil responsibilities as an officer of the law when people are burning in the streets!
QuestParts.Response3: You're right, I'm being petty. I need help clearing the farm to the west.
QuestParts.GiverText: You treacherous snake! The town is burning and you are willing to waste more time to take it up with my chief! Oh Dios mío

QuestParts.Response2: Now stay here and defend the staging area. You will just get in my way.
QuestParts.Response1: Thank you. Now, I expect you to help me with the farm to the west.
QuestParts.Response3: You make me sick. Tell me what I need to know, then get lost.
QuestParts.GiverText: Errr.... umm... one three seven, two nine oh.

QuestParts.Response2: Sigh. Give me your badge number.
QuestParts.Response1: I've heard enough. I know a demon in disguise when I see one! Time for you to die!
QuestParts.Response3: Ugh your incompetence is painful. Tell me what the chief wants me to know, then I want you out of my sight.
QuestParts.GiverText: I would never! I....um..... Larry, back me up here?
